com.mumfrey.liteloader.api

Interface InterfaceProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientPluginChannels, ClientPluginChannelsClient, LiteLoaderEventBroker, LiteLoaderEventBrokerClient, MessageBus, PacketEvents, PacketEventsClient, PluginChannels, ServerPluginChannels

    public interface InterfaceProvider
    LiteLoader Extensible API - Interface Provider InterfaceProviders are able to advertise and provide Listener interfaces which can be implemented by mods or other Listener-derived classes.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends Listener> getListenerBaseType()
      Base type of Listeners which can consume events provided by this provider
      void initProvider()
      Initialise this provider, called AFTER enumeration but before binding
      void registerInterfaces(InterfaceRegistrationDelegate delegate)
      The provider should call back against the supplied delegate in order to advertise the interfaces it provides.

    • Method Detail

      • getListenerBaseType

        java.lang.Class<? extends Listener> getListenerBaseType()
        Base type of Listeners which can consume events provided by this provider

      • registerInterfaces

        void registerInterfaces(InterfaceRegistrationDelegate delegate)
        The provider should call back against the supplied delegate in order to advertise the interfaces it provides.
        Parameters:
        delegate -

      • initProvider

        void initProvider()
        Initialise this provider, called AFTER enumeration but before binding
